meta.description: "April Showers bring May flowers."\n Art drawn by @hsse\n Holiday pet created on May 2024 Holidays!
meta.title: 2024may_flower

meta.description:
Lavender stands

 Where cracked earth yields,
 where dust takes flight,
 through purple fields,
 in golden light.

 Where wind unravels names,
 where silence sways like grass,
 and musing claims,
 shattered glass.

 though often unseen, in spaces between.

meta.title: 2025june_primrose

meta.description:
Glass shatters so easily,
dancing in rainbow colors,
light appearing like a kaleidoscope.

We're broken,
beautifully, like shards.

Art drawn by Heather
Holiday pet created to celebrate November 2025!
